meanings.definition: The quality or state of being niggardly.
meanings.sent1: Her niggardlinesses with money made it hard for her to enjoy life.
meanings.sent2: His niggardlinesses were evident in the way he never shared his snacks.
meanings.sent3: The niggardlinesses of the squirrel with its acorns was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The niggardlinesses of the old tree with its leaves seemed almost intentional.
meanings.sent5: The niggardlinesses of the landlord with heating made the tenants shiver in winter.

meanings.definition: The act of being stingy or miserly.
meanings.sent1: The niggardlinesses of the rich man were known throughout the town.
meanings.sent2: She was frustrated by the niggardlinesses of her boss when it came to bonuses.
meanings.sent3: The niggardlinesses of the child with sharing toys was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The niggardlinesses of time seemed to slow down during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The niggardlinesses of the chef with spices left the dish bland and unappetizing.
